channel.title: Sorry for such noob ? i forgot
channel.description: how do you change wild exp rate agin i've changed before but forgot and search bar don't bring up anything you ask it...

item.title: Sorry for such noob ? i forgot
item.dc:creator: @Nuk Nuk
item.description:
@Nuk wrote:

GameVars class

/**
 * Experience multiplier - name says it all.
 */

Under that, add

public static double WildExpMultiplier = 2.0; // change 2.0 to w/e

Player class

                if(multiplied)
                        amount*=GameVars.expMultiplier;

Under add

if(getLocation().inWilderness()) amount*=GameVars.WildExpMultiplier;

Read full topic
